content: CFS-MSL GPA Adjustable Gangplate Easily adjustable gangplate for varying capacity requirements in future cable additions ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-adjust gangplate to cover your current and future cabling needs Includes ready-to-install smoke gasket – no additional products required Available for single- or double-ganged rows of modular fire sleeves Applications Suitable for extreme cable capacity requirements in walls Surface-mounted use on drywall, concrete and masonry CFS-MSL GCL Clamps are required for ganging ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2341225 - Adjustable gang plate CFS-MSL GPA 24x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2341226 - Adjustable gang plate CFS-MSL GPA 24x8 - Package Size 1 pc
